description.value:
Magical nanites repair a mech’s hull.

Reconstruction (3 PP) As a standard action, the mech repairs its hull, healing an amount of Hit Points equal to [[/r 1d6]] × the mech’s tier [[@details.tier]]. Once a mech has been repaired in this way, it can’t benefit from this ability again for 24 hours.

Builder Swarm (4 PP) As a standard action, the mech repairs the hull of a mech within 100 feet, healing an amount of Hit Points equal to [[/r 1d6]] × the mech’s tier [[@details.tier]]. Once a mech has been repaired, it can’t benefit from this ability again for 24 hours.
